readable.title: 3107889179_106d223345
readable.content: A grandmother and a small child are sitting at a table being served by a woman in a black shirt . an old lady and a child are sitting at an ornate green table whilst being served by food by an African person . A young boy , a young girl , an older woman and a man gather for a meal People are sitting at a green table set with placemats and green glasses . Various members of a family are gathering around a decorated dining table .
